key.name: enabled
key.description: Search for torrents on api-bay

key.name: regex-match
key.description: How many characters should be typed before the plugin starts searching.

key.name: bonus
key.description: Adds this rank to the score of the query.

key.name: enabled-in-default
key.description: Whether this plugin should be searched when no plugins are selected

key.name: update-interval
key.description: The update interval in milliseconds for this plugin. this setting has no effect when running with multiple plugins. Values lower than 1 disables this as well.

key.name: category-ids
key.description: List of category IDs to include in searches
